script1.segment1: Timmy stood excitedly beside his shiny new bicycle eager to ride with dads help today
script1.segment2: His dad held the back of the bike steady as Timmy sat on the seat
script1.segment3: Dad gave Timmy a push and he started gliding slowly on the pavement outside
script1.segment4: Timmy pedaled faster and faster with dads support feeling more confident every second now
script1.segment5: As they rode around the block Timmy beamed with pride at his new skill level
script1.segment6: Dad cheered and hugged Timmy proud of him for learning so quickly today itself

script2.segment1: Timmy wanted to ride a bike like his friends but kept wobbling and falling down
script2.segment2: His dad sat behind him holding the bike steady as Timmy pedaled slowly forward
script2.segment3: With every try Timmy gained more balance and control on two wheels now slowly
script2.segment4: Dad let go of the bike for a second and Timmy rode on by himself
script2.segment5: He looked back at his dad with a huge smile feeling super proud and happy
script2.segment6: Timmy rode up to his dad and hugged him tight saying thanks for helping

script3.segment1: Timmy had always been scared to ride a bike but dads patience helped him now
script3.segment2: His dad pushed him gently and Timmy started rolling slowly on flat ground outside
script3.segment3: As he picked up speed Timmy felt the wind in his hair and laughed loudly
script3.segment4: Dad ran alongside him holding his hand and cheering him on every step now
script3.segment5: Timmy rode farther and farther on his own getting more confident every minute now
script3.segment6: He stopped and turned around with a big grin on his face feeling happy

script4.segment1: Timmy sat on his bike looking nervous and unsure about riding on two wheels
script4.segment2: His dad gave him a reassuring smile and said dont worry ill be right here
script4.segment3: With a gentle push Timmy started moving slowly on the pavement outside now
script4.segment4: He pedaled and steered feeling more balanced and in control every second now
script4.segment5: As he rode past his dad Timmy shouted I did it and felt super happy
script4.segment6: His dad cheered and clapped for him beaming with pride at his little rider
